import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import Head from 'next/Head' import { Button, Divider, Grid, List, ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemText, makeStyles, Typography, GridList, GridListTile, useTheme, } from '@material-ui/core' import { usePagesContext } from '../../src/contexts/PagesContext' import Link from '../../src/Link' import PageHeader from '../../src/ui/PageHeader' import { useLanguageContext } from '../../src/contexts/LangContext' const tileData = [ { img: '/assets/events_photos/events_1.jpg', title: 'Image', author: 'author', cols: 2, }, { img: '/assets/events_photos/events_2.jpg', title: 'Image', author: 'author', cols: 1, }, { img: '/assets/events_photos/events_3.png', title: 'Image', author: 'author', cols: 1, }, { img: '/assets/events_photos/events_4.jpg', title: 'Image', author: 'author', cols: 2, }, { img: '/assets/events_photos/events_5.jpg', title: 'Image', author: 'author', cols: 1, }, { img: '/assets/events_photos/events_6.jpg', title: 'Image', author: 'author', cols: 1, }, { img: '/assets/events_photos/events_7.jpg', title: 'Image', author: 'author', cols: 1, }, ] const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ root: { display: 'flex', flexWrap: 'wrap', justifyContent: 'space-around', overflow: 'hidden', backgroundColor: theme.palette.background.paper, }, gridList: { width: '90%', height: 'auto', }, })) const ServicesEvents = props => { const classes = useStyles() const { setPageIndecies } = usePagesContext() const theme = useTheme() useEffect(() => { setPageIndecies('/services/events') }, []) const { siteData } = useLanguageContext() return ( Custom VR events for exhibitions and conferences | VRFunTeam {siteData.services.events.title} {siteData.services.events.text} {siteData.services.events.points.map(point => ðŸ¥½ )} {/* ðŸ¥½ ðŸ¥½ ðŸ¥½ ðŸ¥½ */}
{tileData.map(tile => ( ))}
) } export default ServicesEvents
